comments.en:
All the Epson laser printers understand PCL 5e, PCL 6, and/or PostScript and so they should work with standard drivers, but this driver provided by Epson gives some additional options to the supported printers.

Version 1.0.4 of this driver works only with GhostScript 5.50, not with GhostScript 6.5x and newer. For the new GhostScript versions use this patch from Crutcher Dunnavant (Red Hat).

The driver's web page offers the new version 3.0.2 only for the AcuLaser C4000, but in reality it supports all printers which the previous version already supported plus the AcuLaser C4000. So choose always the AcuLaser C4000 as your printer model when downloading the driver, regardless what model you really have. During the installation take care again which model you have. This driver version is prepared for both GhostScript 5.x and 6.x. For GhostScript 7.x or newer a small fix is needed: Execute the following command line in the main directory of the unpacked driver source package:

perl -p -i -e "s/GS_VERSION_MAJOR\s*==\s*6/GS_VERSION_MAJOR >= 6/" gdevescv.c gdevesmv.c

Then the driver also compiles with these versions of GhostScript.
